metadata.purpose: AI training for dengue breeding site detection

scenario.description: Flower vase with stagnant water and floating leaves
Plastic bucket half-filled with rainwater outdoors
Pet water bowl outdoors with old stagnant water
Plant saucer under pot with standing water
Air conditioner drip tray with accumulated water
Discarded tire lying flat filled with rainwater
Empty plastic bottles and cans with rainwater
Coconut shells with water collected inside
Open cement tank with collected rainwater
Plastic sheets with water pooled on construction materials
Clogged roadside drain with stagnant dirty water
Blocked rain gutters with green stagnant water
Potholes in road filled with stagnant rainwater
Tree holes filled with rainwater and organic matter
Bamboo stumps cut and filled with water
Irrigation channel with stagnant water between crops
Rubber tapping cups after rain collection
Boat or canoe with rainwater collected inside hull
Truck bed with water pooling in corners
Motorbike seat covers forming puddles after rain
Abandoned rickshaw cart holding accumulated water
Cooling tower with stagnant water at base (poorly maintained)
Factory yard unused machinery trapping rainwater
Open oil drums or chemical containers in storage yards
Shipping container roof depressions with rainwater pools
Unused fish pond with stagnant dirty water (no fish)
Irrigation tank not drained or covered properly
Palm tree spathes (leaf casing) collecting water naturally
Unused livestock water trough filled with rainwater
Fertilizer/grain sacks forming water pockets on plastic surfaces
Street vendor umbrella or tarpaulin sagging with rainwater
Public toilet broken tanks or buckets left unemptied
Market waste bins with water accumulated in bottoms
Park trash cans with open tops collecting rainwater
Concrete flowerbeds or park planters with clogged drainage
Old shoes, boots, or gloves left outside filled with water
Hollow bamboo fencing or decorative poles with water inside
Plastic toys (cars, dolls, buckets) abandoned outdoors with water
Old mattresses or furniture absorbing rain forming water pools
Retired aircraft in graveyards with open compartments holding water
Empty plastic bucket placed outdoors
Dry tire lying flat in yard
Construction site with uneven surfaces and materials
Roof gutters that appear blocked but no visible water
Garden area with multiple empty containers
Empty clean flower vase indoors
Dry concrete pavement with no puddles
Flowing river with clear moving water
Swimming pool with clear chlorinated water
Fish pond with aquatic life and circulation
Parked car in driveway
Person standing in garden
Clean dry dishes on kitchen counter
Waterfall with fast-moving water
Irrigation channel with constant water flow
Ocean coastline with waves
Large lake or reservoir with circulation
Swimming pool with chlorine treatment and filtration
Water tank with sealed lid and regular use
Fish pond stocked with larvivorous fish (guppies, tilapia)
Decorative fountain with circulating pump
Dry concrete floor after rain (absorbed quickly)
Open field with soil that absorbs water rapidly
Dry trash pile without visible containers
Sunlit roof that dries quickly with no depressions
Large dam or hydroelectric plant
Industrial cooling pond with constant monitoring
Pets (dogs, cats) in outdoor setting
People walking in park or street
Garden with healthy drainage and no standing water
Various animals in natural habitat (no containers)
Partially visible container behind vegetation
Reflective surface that could be water or wet pavement
Dark shadowed area with possible water accumulation
Collapsed tent or canopy with possible water inside (angle unclear)
Partially blocked roadside drain (water visibility obstructed)
Satellite image where surface reflectivity could be puddles or shadows
Thick vegetation where leaves may or may not hold water
Rusted metal drums outdoors (image resolution too low to see water)
Underground or covered areas with unclear water status
Weather-damaged structures with potential water collection points
Blurred motion photo unusable for analysis
Extremely dark image with no visible details
Heavily pixelated or corrupted image data

hotspot_criteria: Container-like structure that can hold water
potential_criteria: Container present but no visible water
not_hotspot_criteria: No water present and no collection potential
